[[/collapsible]]

**Subject:** Kain Pathos Crow

**Commentary:** This coat of arms is partly for the author himself and partly for his author character. On the shield, I chose to depict his three most famous works. In the first and fourth quarters (that's left above and right below for the viewer) we see the comedy and tragedy masks, which is a clear reference to [[[SCP-035]]]. The other quarters depict the climax of the Biblical story of Cain and Able; this being a reference to [[[SCP-073]]] and [[[SCP-076]]]. The supporter is my interpretation of the author character, who as we all know is a very good boy.

**How the prompt fits in:** Kain Pathos Crow's author character wears a suit. I tried to reflect that as well as possible, but it turns out that it's hard to fit a dog into a suit. But then again, carrying a shield around all the time is heavy work, so I don't blame him for taking of his jacket.
